title: Jerusalem's Lot
description: It is 1850, and Charles Boone has taken up residence in his family’s dilapidated mansion. Prompted by the inexplicable shunning he receives from the local village and the mysterious sounds coming from the mansion’s walls, Boone and his manservant Calvin McCann begin to investigate the Boone family history and a dark secret that lies buried beneath the ghost town Jerusalem’s Lot.
author: Stephen        King
